about_the_game:
“Cowboy Life Simulator” is an immersive, yet super chill sim focused on starting a new life out in the Wild West, and growing into the local community. It’s up to you as the player how the story unfolds, and how many of the map’s secrets you’ll be able to discover. Leave a lasting mark on the people around you, and uncover everything this wild land has to offer!

Despite being a simulator, our game contains many elements we all know and love most from RPGs, such as rich and profound narrative, skill acquisition, and progression. With a highly engaging loop and captivating gameplay, the game naturally makes you want to stay in this world for hours on end, expanding your ranch and exploring the surrounding land.

Building relationships is a major part of the game’s concept – each of the characters, even the side ones, has their own personality, habits, and problems. That way, the quests they give you aren’t simply tasks to tick off in the journal – they’re the very real problems your neighbors have to face. The dialogues are not just lines of text you click through while waiting to move on, either – they’re conversations with people just like the protagonist, trying to find their way in the unpredictable reality of the Wild West.

Searching for and gathering resources, construction, decorating the level, trading, animal care and husbandry, planting crops – those are just some of the key mechanics in “Cowboy Life Simulator”. However, if the simple life of a cowboy and farmer isn’t exactly what you’re looking for, grab your revolver and hop on your horse to seek adventure in even the furthest corners of the map, uncovering its best-hidden secrets.

Experience “Cowboy Life Simulator” with us!

Become a part of the “Cowboy Life Simulator” community! Join our growing Discord server and be first in line for all the news and updates straight from the developers at the heart of the studio. Follow our other social media to stay up to date with all our plans – and they’re not small. Conference and event attendance, even more playtests, and many new game features – don’t miss out on anything!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590k / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 4GB or Radeon equivalent
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 8GB or Radeon equivalent
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: It's 19th century America, and you want to escape the city and go find your new life path out in the Wild West. Is it a peaceful life of a humble rancher that you seek, or is it a grand cowboy adventure? Or perhaps – it’s both..?
